original_text: And the fifth angel poured out his vial upon the seat of the beast; and his kingdom was full of darkness; and they gnawed their tongues for pain,
korean_text: 또 다섯째 천사가 그 대접을 짐승의 왕좌에 쏟으니 그 나라가 곧 어두워지며 사람들이 아파서 자기 혀를 깨물고

sentences.original_text: And the fifth angel poured out his vial
upon the seat of the beast
and his kingdom was full of darkness
and they gnawed their tongues for pain
